about_the_game:
Welcome, stranger!

You've arrived at Farmouth Island, a foreboding stretch of wilderness off the Massachusetts coast. Here lies the heart of The Bornless, an action horror FPS where the veil between reality and the abyss is perilously thin. Face off against other players, play as demons, and wield Black Magick in a battle for survival and supremacy.




SURVIVAL HORROR EXTRACTION

Step into Ritual Mode, a relentless PvPvE survival horror extraction that tests your resilience against demonic forces and rival players. Begin your harrowing journey in an isolated cabin and navigate through the dense, mist-shrouded forests of Farmouth Island. Collect crucial resources, tackle mysterious objectives, and survive the terror that lurks around every corner.

GAMEPLAY OVERVIEW

Phase 1: Loot and Explore - Start in a secluded cabin with your duo partner, armed with your standard loadout or the spoils from previous missions. Venture through haunting landscapes, fight for Sigils, battle cultists and demons to complete quests, and gather valuable items.


Phase 2: The Ritual - Use Incense to activate ancient ritual sites known as Gates, summoning events yield rare Sigils necessary for the final confrontation. Each completed ritual exposes you to danger, highlighting your location to rival players


Phase 3: Hunt or Be Hunted - Complete the ritual, invoke the demon, and hunt the remaining players, who must find an extraction point before the time runs out to escape the island.




UNITE AND SURVIVE

Engage directly in the chaos of The Bornless with a unique blend of PvP and PvE elements. Whether flying solo or teaming up with friends, face off against other players and demonic forces alike. Decipher ancient totems, survive deadly rituals, and wield everything from powerful spells to fierce weaponry to conquer human and supernatural adversaries.




LOOT AND EXTRACT

Thrive in the relentless environment of Farmouth Island, where each victory helps you progress further. Progress your character with stronger weapons and abilities throughout each match, strategically vital for survival and dominance in this brutal landscape.

Each successful extraction escalates your power and secures you invaluable resources and collectibles from our rarity-based loot system.



CONQUER AND CLAIM

Build more than just bases—forge a dynasty. Start with a humble cabin and expand it into a sprawling mansion as you harness the resources of Farmouth Island. Join or create factions to band together with friends and foes, enhancing your survival and strategic power. Rise through the ranks in seasonal tournaments and face new quests and challenges with each update, ensuring your journey through The Bornless is ever-evolving and filled with opportunities for growth and prestige.

Are You Ready to Begin? Speak the Words...

Thee I Invoke… The Bornless One.



KEY FEATURES

  • Ritual Mode: Immerse yourself in the core PvPvE experience of The Bornless. Navigate through three intense phases: Loot and Explore, The Ritual, and Hunt or Be Hunted—as you and your partner seek to embody or outwit the demonic entities that stalk Farmouth Island.
  • Dynamic Environment: Traverse a large open landscape filled with various challenges. Utilize vehicles for transportation and strategic advantages while exploring various terrains, from dense forests to mysterious abandoned towns.
  • Customization and Growth: Develop from a simple cabin to a fortified base. Customize your loadout with powerful weapons and Black Magick abilities, enhancing your strategic options and chances of survival.
  • Seasonal Player Progression: Show off your experience by unlocking new skins, loadouts, and other customization options as you level up.
  • Factions and Safehouses: Join or create factions to engage in global campaigns and seasonal tournaments. Build and customize your Safehouse, a pre-match hub that is a testament to your success in The Bornless.
  • Continuous Content and Seasonal Challenges: Dive into a world with regularly updated quests and activities within your faction. Each season brings new challenges and unique rewards, keeping the gameplay fresh and engaging.

content_descriptors.notes: In The Bornless players will experience repeated scenes of violence in our FPS game. Players will encounter hostile opponents played by either other players or by our A.I NPCs. In our game players are encouraged to fight one another with melee weapons, magical spells and firearms. Throughout the environment in the game players will be able to see themes of gore which are used to thematically enhance the immersive fictional universe of the game. These themes of gore consist of such things as bodies wrapped in clothes, blood splatters and indications of violence having taken place. In The Bornless there are also elements of psychological horror as the game features demons. These demons are often tasked with hunting down players creating a sense of terror. In the universe of The Bornless there are also depictions of drug and alcohol use, namely references to the consumption of tobacco and cigarettes. Players will have no control over consuming drugs or alcohol and they are merely present in the game for story and character building.

name: The Bornless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel/Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel/Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to The Bornless, an action horror FPS. Face off against other players, summon demons, and build factions in a Lovecraftian world. Use Black Magick, acquire powerful weapons, upgrade your Safehouse, and strategize to survive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Macedonian
*languages with full audio support
